title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W (a - largest): 29.8 x 46.1 cm (11 3/4 x 18 1/8 in.)
H x W (g - smallest): 33.5 x 5.4 cm (13 3/16 x 2 1/8 in.)
description: White ground with leafy blue zigzags and curling floral sprays in green, dark pink, purple, yellow, blue and orange.
